      • tableTypes

        public SchemaCrawlerOptionsBuilder tableTypes(java.lang.String tableTypesString)
        Sets table types requested for output from a comma-separated list of table types. For example: TABLE,VIEW,SYSTEM_TABLE,GLOBAL TEMPORARY,ALIAS,SYNONYM
        Parameters:
        tableTypesString - Comma-separated list of table types. Can be null if all supported table types are requested.
